Package com.intellij.execution.configurations

Class PtyCommandLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.execution.configurations.GeneralCommandLine
      • com.intellij.execution.configurations.PtyCommandLine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserDataHolder

    public class PtyCommandLine
extends GeneralCommandLine
    A flavor of GeneralCommandLine to start processes with Pseudo-Terminal (PTY). Warning: PtyCommandLine works with ProcessHandler only in blocking read mode. Please make sure that you use appropriate ProcessHandler implementation. Works for Linux, macOS, and Windows. On Windows, PTY is emulated by creating an invisible console window (see Pty4j and WinPty implementation).

    • Nested Class Summary
